Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Number of times 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' occurs in the entire event log
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities

Name: Percentage of process variants that contain 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' appearing immediately after 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' occurrences that are preceded by 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Ratio of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' to 'First Look-Your updates are overdue' across all cases
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'First Look-Your updates are overdue'

Name: Number of variants where 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' appears within three activities after 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases containing 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' that eventually lead to a final 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' (indicating successful completion of the production phase)
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Frequency of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' in comparison to other terminal or near-terminal activities such as 'SW-EIC Accept' or 'RW-EIC Accept'
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' executions that occur in cases which previously included 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Number of times 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' is directly followed by another activity (to assess if it truly acts as a waiting state or triggers further processing)
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities

Name: Percentage of all accepted manuscripts (ending with 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' post-decision) that passed through 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Percentage of variants where 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' appears only once and is not repeated, indicating stable progression into production
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' occurrences in cases that originated from 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' versus those that did not involve reviewer agreement at all
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' relative to the total number of checklist- or revision-related activities (e.g., 'SWâ€“Major Revision due in 1 week')
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases
